oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 301st Tank Battalion

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; War; Tanks (Military Science); Flags
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three hundred and first Tank Battalion. America's heavies going into action at Souplet on the morning of October 17, 1918. Note the American flag flying from one of the tanks. St. Souplet, Nord, France.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States. Army. Signal Corps
